sentences.english: They are then eviscerated and chilled.
sentences.chinese: 最后再去除内脏并进行预冷处理。

sentences.english: Offal consumption has halved in Britain and America in the last 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 最近30年，内脏消费量在英国和美国减少了一半。

sentences.english: Doctors took X-rays of his chest that showed his insides littered with screws.
sentences.chinese: 医生通过X光片发现他的内脏里到处都是螺丝钉。

sentences.english: The hyperglycemic effect could be eliminated by bilateral splanchnicotomy.
sentences.chinese: 切除双侧内脏大神经可消除吗啡的高血糖效应。

sentences.english: Gut the rabbit before you cook it.
sentences.chinese: 烧煮之前先把兔子的内脏取出。

sentences.english: Functionally, both cerebellum and PAG are related to visceral activities.
sentences.chinese: 小脑和PAG均与许多内脏的功能活动有关。

sentences.english: Turkeys need to be stunned and dispatched and gutted.
sentences.chinese: 工人需要先打晕火鸡，剖杀并取出内脏。

sentences.english: The internal organs inside the thoracic and abdominal cavities are often called viscera.
sentences.chinese: 位于胸腔及腹腔的内部器官，通常称为内脏。

sentences.english: The effects of section of splanchnic nerves on the erythropoietic parameters has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文观察了切除内脏大神经对红细胞参数的影响。

sentences.english: Her guts were full of writhing snakes biting at her bowels.
sentences.chinese: 她的内脏中仿佛爬满了毒蛇，扭曲着咬着肠胃。

sentences.english: Segmental vessels return blood to the dorsal vessel via the body wall or gut.
sentences.chinese: 经由体壁和内脏，部分的血管使血液返回背部血管。

sentences.english: Two of the Dragons were lying, bathing in their blood and covered with their own entrails .
sentences.chinese: 两只巨龙在自己的血泊和内脏堆中躺下了。

sentences.english: Methods Electrically stimulating GSN was used as an experimental model of visceral pain.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用伤害性电刺激内脏大神经作为内脏痛模型。

sentences.english: Methods Electrically stimulating GSN was used as an experimental model of visceral pain.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用伤害性电刺激内脏大神经作为内脏痛模型。

sentences.english: When the tumbling wave had drawn even with Deepwater Isle, he blew till his innards bled .
sentences.chinese: 当翻滚的波浪前进到深水岛时，他吹到内脏开始流血。

sentences.english: Carbolic acid can damage internal organs if ingested.
sentences.chinese: 苯酚如果被摄入体内，可能会损坏人体的内脏。

definition: the four limbs of the body
five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]
